pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A system tray extension allowing to set up custom icon, hiding to tray instead of closing, display the number of unread messages in mailing applications.
This is a fork of [foudfou/FireTray](https://github.com/foudfou/FireTray)
It is a workaround for issues: * [foudfou/FireTray #143](https://github.com/foudfou/FireTray/issues/143) * [foudfou/FireTray #210](https://github.com/foudfou/FireTray/issues/210)
